content: v for valentine sock pattern by ellie jones thank you for downloading the valentine s sock pattern this pattern is written so that you can choose the number of stitches that you normally use to make socks i have calculated the stitch pattern for 56 60 64 68 and 72 stitches if you have not made socks before you can calculate the number of stitches you require to do so knit a swatch in the round and measure how many stitches you are getting per inch width ways then multiply the number of stitches per inch by the circumference of your leg in inches minus 1 5 inches negative ease so that your socks are not too slouchy i have also created a video tutorial you tube to help with fitting see link below for a full list of my tutorials https //www youtube com/playlist list=plwli7abzwhb8u_srmn4h22mom4gbcwrfi requirements 100g sock weight yarn 2 stitch markers and one progress keeper 2 5mm needles abbreviations s1 slip one stitch purl wise ssk slip two stitches knit wise slip them back to the left needle purl wise and knit the two stitches together k2tog knit two stitches together yo yarn forward bring your yarn to the front of your work as if to purl then over the needle to create a new stitch s2kpsso slip 2 stitches knit wise separately k1 slip the two slipped stitches over the knitted stitch ribbed cuff cast on 56 60 64 68 or 72 stitches using a long tail cast on k2 p2 rib for 18 rounds leg of sock knit for 5 rounds lace pattern written instructions round 1 *k7 8 9 10 11 k1 k2tog yo k1 yo ssk k1 k2tog yo k1 yo ssk k9 10 11 12 13 repeat from* round 2 knit all even rounds round 3 * k7 8 9 10 11 k2tog yo k3 yo s2kpsso yo k3 yo ssk k8 9 10 11 12 repeat from* round 5 *k8 9 10 11 12 yo ssk k7 k2tog yo k9 10 11 12 13 repeat from* round 7 *k9 10 11 12 13 yo ssk k5 k2tog yo k10 11 12 13 14 repeat from* round 9 *k10 11 12 13 14 yo ssk k3 k2tog yo k11 12 13 14 15 repeat from* round 11 *k11 12 13 14 15 yo ssk k1 k2tog yo k12 13 14 15 16 repeat from* round 13 *k12 13 14 15 16 yo s2kpsso yo k13 14 15 16 17 repeat from* round 14 knit repeat rounds 7-14 once more knit at least 5 rounds depending how long you would like your socks lace pattern charted instructions ꓳ x ꓳ 21 on every round k7 8 9 10 11 follow 20 chart k8 9 10 11 12 ꓳ / \ ꓳ 19 18 complete twice around the leg of the sock ꓳ / \ ꓳ 17 16 following completion of the chart knit at least ꓳ / \ ꓳ 15 5 rounds depending
